snippet.title: Book Review: Into the Firestorm: A Novel of San Francisco, 1906
snippet.description: Plucky orphan survives San Francisco's big quake.

snippet.title: Television Review: The Streets of San Francisco
snippet.description: Classic cop series offers look at important time, place.

snippet.title: San Francisco Word Search
snippet.description: By doing this easy word puzzle with your child, you'll both learn the key elements that make San Francisco a unique city.

snippet.title: TV Review: The Franchise: A Season with the San Francisco Giants
snippet.description: Baseball reality celebrates sports heroes; strong language.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: Homeward Bound II: Lost in San Francisco
snippet.description: Definitely not as good as the first.

snippet.title: San Francisco, California | The Hilly City by the Bay
snippet.description: The City by the Bay has it all. Hop on a cable car for the hilliest ride, ferry across the bay to old Alcatraz prison, then hit Chinatown for dim sum.

snippet.title: San Francisco Travel Map
snippet.description: Kids might leave their hearts in the City by the Bay, but they can take this map with them as a memento when the vacation is over.

snippet.title: San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park
snippet.description: This is the place to really experience San Francisco's seafaring past. Six of the seven wooden boats moored at the park's Hyde Street Pier are national landmarks, including the square...

snippet.title: Mission San Francisco Solano de Sonoma (Sonoma Mission)
snippet.description: The northernmost mission in the chain of 21 Catholic settlements that once fed and housed missionaries as they traveled up and down the state, Mission San Francisco Solano – as it's officially known – is one of the most...

snippet.title: A Day Out in San Luis Obispo
snippet.description: With a prestigious university at its center, you'll find the diverse mix of cultures, cafes, and cool activities of Berkeley, Calif., hard to resist.
